fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Middle Finger: Your next nomination will eat shit and die
- The Council Will Decide Your Fate (1 use): Either end the trial or send it to the execution phase immediately.
- Guards! (2 Uses): Become death immune for the night.
- Fuc Kyou I Nparticular: Roleblock a player for the night, and prevent them from speaking or voting during the following day. This ability does not count as visiting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Imagine attempting to format this in a TOS-style format.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of the game.
